conclusion: Analyze forces and use equilibrium conditions to solve for force F.
Identify forces: weight (W = mg), tension (T), normal force (N).
Resolve tension T into vertical (T cos(θ)) and horizontal (T sin(θ)) components.
Apply equilibrium conditions: net force in vertical and horizontal directions must be zero.
Solve for tension T: T = mg / cos(θ).
Relate tension T to force F: F = T.
